column1: “No Juice” Advanced Bodybuilding Workout Routine
column9: Avoid plateauing with the "No Juice" routine, which manipulates intensity, frequency, and volume to help you continue progressing in the gym.

column1: 10 Week Chest Size & Bench Press Strength Workout
column9: This ten week training cycle is designed to not only boost your barbell bench press prowess but also pack on slabs of muscle mass to your upper and lower chest.

column1: 10 Week Mass Building Program
column9: This workout is designed to increase your muscle mass as much as possible in 10 weeks. Works each muscle group hard once per week using mostly heavy compound exercises.

column1: 100 Rep Hell: A Shocker Muscle Building Workout
column9: Need a change? You’ve come to the right workout. This one week shocker is meant to break through the boredom and monotony, and beat your body into growth.

column1: 100 Reps Per Set Shocker Fullbody Workout
column9: Blast out of a rut with 100 reps per set. 100 rep sets can be used to shock the entire body for a week or two, or to bring up a lagging part.

column1: 12 Week Beginners Training Routine
column9: A twelve week full body beginners routine designed to get your body ready for an intense split routine. Includes a detailed week by week plan.

column1: 18 Week Chin Up & Dip Program For An Impressive Upper Body
column9: Chin ups and dips are 2 overlooked but important bodyweight exercises. This 18 week workout protocol features a single training day dedicated to these movements.

column1: 2 Day Simple A/B Split by Steve
column9: Effective 2 day per week fullbody routine that is perfect for building muscle and strength. If you don't have time to live in the gym this is the routine for you.

column1: The Ultimate 20 Minute Treadmill Workout to Get Shredded
column9: Tired of those drawn-out cardio sessions that steal your pump? Try out Coach Myers' Pump & Run workout that'll help you shred without losing your pump!

column1: 5 Best 20 Minute HIIT Cardio Workouts For Rapid Fat Loss
column9: You don't have to spend hours on cardio equipment to burn fat. Try one of these HIIT cardio routines for faster (and less boring!) fat loss.

column1: Get Shredded For The New Year: 21-Day Fat Loss Workout
column9: If your physique isn't where you want it to be, start your New Year off right with this intense 21-day fat loss workout from Coach Dustin Myers.

column1: Love Handle Workouts: 5 Routines That Torch Unwanted Fat
column9: Stuck with some extra holiday flab? Burn it off faster by tackling these intense fat burning workouts. Includes workouts for a variety of different equipment.

column1: Power Hour Cardio: A Full Body Cardio Workout For Gym Rats
column9: Let me guess. You hate cardio. Well this total body, endurance-building, fat blaster was designed with you in mind. Try Power Hour Cardio if you're up for a challenge!

column1: The Punisher Vol. II: A Ruthless Full Body Fat Burning Workout
column9: Do you have what it takes? Eric Brown's twist on his Punisher workout takes simple kettlebell moves and turns them into an intense total body workout.

column1: Convenient Cardio: Killer 15 Minute Home Workout Plan
column9: If you're looking for a way to make cardio a lot more fun and productive without it taking up too much time, then this Sledgehammer and Sandbag Tabata Workout is for you!

column1: 6 Intense Treadmill Workouts To Get Shredded For Summer
column9: Start conditioning your body and burn fat with these 6 effective treadmill workouts that are not only designed to be brutal, but to deliver results and get those muscles popping!

column1: Jen Jewell's Summer Countdown: Burn Fat & Build A Bikini Booty
column9: The time to sculpt your summer body is now! Get lean, healthy, and strong with Jen Jewell's Summer Countdown Workout that combines strength training with cardio bursts for maximum fat loss.

column1: 8 Minute Squat & Push-Up Tabata Workout For Fat Loss
column9: You can burn fat and get ripped in just 8 minutes with this high intensity Tabata circuit that combines push-ups and squats.

column1: Building The Perfect Fat Burning Circuit
column9: Brad Borland presents a 5 element template that enables you to build your own effective fat blasting circuit workout. Benefits and example circuit workouts included.

column1: The Punisher: A Relentless Better Body Workout
column9: Eric Brown delivers a workout with a wallop. The Punisher is deceptively simple, comprised of 5 movements: walking lunges, bent-over rows, push ups, burpees and a sprint.

column1: Dumbbell & Bodyweight HIIT Workout: A Real Calorie Burner
column9: Torch through calories with this partner-based cardio workout. A series of 12 exercises are performed in a back and forth manner, adding reps with each set.

column1: Kettlebell Cardio Complex To Smoke Fat And Improve Conditioning
column9: This 4 exercise kettlebell complex and circuit is performed for a total of 4 rounds. You can use this workout 1-3 times per week to burn fat or improve conditioning.

column1: Prepare For Boot Camp With This 12 Week Workout
column9: So boot camp is only a short time away, and you need to get in shape. This 12 week program will help turn you into a physically fit, running, push up and sit up machine.

column1: Unique Cardio Workouts: 4 Fun Ways To Burn Calories
column9: Unchain yourself from the boring treadmill and inject some fun into your calorie burning regimen with these 4 cardio suggestions from bodybuilder Brad Borland.

column1: MusclePharm Combo Fat Burner Workout
column9: This fat blasting workout from Cory Gregory and MusclePharm utilizes 4 minute blocks comprised of jumping rope and timed resistance training exercises.

column1: No Kettlebell, No Problem - Dumbbell HIIT Workout
column9: You don't need the latest craze to get in a good high intensity, fat burning workout. No kettlebell, no problem! All you need for this cardio workout is a set of dumbbells.

column1: 40 Minute Blast - Abs, Cardio And Resistance Workout
column9: A cardio, weights and abs workout perfect for those days when you need to do something fun at the gym. Simply grab a heavy and light set of dumbbells and go!

column1: 5 Cross Training Workouts For General Conditioning
column9: The following 5 cross training daily workout routines that contain a variety of exercises aimed at improving your overall conditioning.

column1: Countdown To Fitness: A Calisthenics And Bodyweight Workout
column9: A fun and fast fitness challenge, this workout features a combination of calisthenics and bodyweight exercises, and is a great way to burn fat and build conditioning.

column1: Core, Strength And Fat Burn Workout
column9: Potent, powerful and anything but boring. This hardcore fat burning, strength and core building workout will leave you looking and feeling great.

column1: Power Building Beginner Hill Sprint Workout Plan
column9: Go from slug to sprinting machine in only 8 short weeks. This workout plan is designed to help you build power, speed, endurance and burn fat too!

column1: Kettlebell, Bodyweight And Treadmill Cardio Workout
column9: Forget boring cardio workouts! Blast away fat in only 15 minutes per day using only a treadmill, a kettlebell and simple bodyweight exercises.

column1: The Bear Barbell Complex
column9: The Bear Complex is an intense barbell complex circuit that can be used several times per week to help build strength and conditioning.
